attributes.action: block publishing of the old-fashioned, right wing garbage that is the Daily Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Daily Mail was known to support appeasement and alliance with the National Socialist party of Germany prior to England's engagement in WW2. As the Daily mail is generally assosciated with right wing hatred and propaganda it sets a bad example to its readers and causes a lot of problems. I believe this anachronistic drivel has been allowed to fester long enough, and should be removed for the good of the United Kingdom.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
